name: The Wrath of Whispers (Damsel) Pre-Alpha
description:
(We retitled Damsel to The Wrath of Whispers)

Currently we're just looking for feedback on the building system. Once the building resources are well implemented, the combat demo will be coming soon after!

We'd appreciate your feedback on our Discord! 

https://discord.gg/7ydPUNPdMS

You can find out more at 

https://breakingpoint-interactive.com/the-wrath-of-whispers
